name: Squared(DEMO CONCEPT)
description:
This is a game i made for a platformer mechanic i thought would be cool with every level is the same but increases in difficulty and gets more things added on.

The game will be a full thing in the future containing: better artwork and sound quality also with a lot more levels(Probably around 150-200 I'll see but most likely)

Controls:WASD to move and space bar to jump, press 'r' to restart each level and hold space bar to jump higher

Warning: Each level is 100% possible and has been all completed by me.

Tips: Please leave any comments for me for the future of this game and leave any tips for me to in anyone improve anything about the game, thank you! :D
